content:
Adding new characters to Kristal should __not__ be done by replacing existing characters, but by creating new ones.

- To create a custom character, you must create an **[actor](<https://kristal.cc/wiki/actors>)**.
- After creating your actor, if you want them to be playable, you must create a **[party member](<https://kristal.cc/wiki/party-members>)**.
